\ About
\ Material Chess is a fully material designed Android Lollipop optimised game to fully enjoy the wonders of Chess. It is developed by Avijit Ghosh, and is based on, and a continuation of the incredible work done by several people, as stated below. \ 
\ 
\ Dark Knight , by darktemplar824, is an open-source GPLv3 Honeycomb-optimized fork of the Droidfish chess engine, an Android interface \ to the stockfish chess engine. \ 
\ 
\ Droidfish is developed by Peter Österlund at http://web.comhem.se/petero2home/droidfish/ as a similar application \ to Dark Knight for Android phones. It is also licensed under the GPLv3. \ 
\ 
\ Stockfish is an open source chess engine, developed by Tord Romstad, Joona Kiiski and Marco Costalba and licensed under \ the GNU General Public License version 3. The program originated from another open source program by Romstad named Glaurung. \ 
\ 
\ 
\ Features
\ * Opening book
\ * Unlimited undo/redo
\ * Copy/paste to/from clipboard
\ * Analysis mode
\ * Two player mode
\ * Bluetooth play for two players
\ * Computer vs computer mode
\ * Edit board
\ * Support for PGN variations
\ 
\ Bluetooth
\ Material Chess has rudimentary Bluetooth play support, allowing players to \ have a game using two devices. Users must manually select in settings which side \ to play, and then start a game by finding the device to play the game with. \ Bluetooth play is still being developed and is in beta stage at this point. \ 
\ 
\ Hints
\ * In game mode, long press chess board to activate copy/paste menu.
\ * In edit board mode, long press chess board to activate edit menu.
\ * Scroll left/right on the chess board to undo/redo moves.
\ * If the game contains multiple variations, scroll up/down on the chess board to \ go to the previous/next variation.
\ 
\ Analysis
\ Material Chess can analyze games to find better alternatives to moves. By \ using hints described above, players can optimize strategies and use the \ computer to improve their play. Analysis can be activated in Settings. \ 
\ 
\ Opening book
\ Material Chess contains a small internal opening book. If you want to use \ a larger book, you can configure Dark Knight to use a polyglot book file:
\ 1. Create a directory called DarkKnight on the SD card folder.
\ 2. Copy one or more polyglot book files to the DarkKnight directory.
\ 3. From the program menu, activate the Select opening book function.
\ 4. Select the opening book file you want to use.
\ 
\ PGN files
\ Material Chess can load games from PGN files. To use this feature:
\ 1. Create a directory called DarkKnight/pgn on the SD card folder.
\ 2. Copy one or more PGN files to the DarkKnight/pgn directory.
\ 3. Long press the chess board and select Load game from PGN file.
\ 4. Select the file, then the game within the file you want to load.
\ 
\ License
\ GNU GPL v3
\ 
\ Developers
\ * Stockfish is developed by Tord Romstad, Marco Costalba and Joona Kiiski.
\ * Droidfish is developed by Peter Österlund. (http://web.comhem.se/petero2home/droidfish/)
\ * Dark Knight is a Honeycomb fork of Droidfish. Its source is available at SourceForge.net.
\ * Material Chess is a Lollipop fork of Droidfish and Dark Knight.
\

\ CPU Usage
\ If you leave Material Chess running in the background and the GameMode setting \ is set to Analysis or Computer vs Computer, or if Thinking Time \ is set to a large value, Material Chess can use a lot of CPU power.
\ 
\ If you are running on battery power, it is recommended that you disable analysis mode.
